altTitles.en: Age Regressed Genderswap Fiction Middle-Aged Man

description.en: Following a similar narrative to its predecessor (Fuwari! Donpatch), Honnori! Donpatch is a slice of life involving Beauty living with Donpatch. Here, however, it is not a parody, but more a pastiche of Kiyohiko Azuma's beloved slice of life series Yostuba&!
description.ja: 不思議な生物・首領パッチと暮らすビュティ。二人は河原を散歩したり、友達とカラオケしたり、たまに喧嘩もするけど、ほんのりとした日常を過ごしています。だけど首領パッチの知り合いという破天荒が現れて!?

altTitles.ja: 茜部先生は照れ知らず

description.en:
Kouki Sakieda is an assistant for Akira Akanabe, a manga artist he admires, who always tries to praise him in some way. Sakieda is worried that he will end up falling in love with her if this situation continues. Then Akanabe unexpectedly asks him to go out with her... 

The story depicts the daily life of Akanabe-sensei, who lavishes praise on Sakieda without embarrassment, and Sakieda, who tries to accept it all gracefully.
description.ja: 『崎枝君ってさ私のこと好き？』　憧れの漫画家・茜部アキラのもとでアシスタントとして働く崎枝コウキ。憧れが次第に恋心へと変わっていたある日、まさかの両想いであることがわかり、なんと二人は恋人同士に！　しかし、茜部先生は思った事を口にしちゃう上に照れ知らずで、コウキを褒め殺してくる！
description.pt-br:
Kouki Sakieda é assistente de Akira Akanabe, uma mangaká que ele admira. Ela sempre tenta elogiá-lo de alguma forma. Sakieda está preocupado que possa acabar se apaixonando por ela se essa situação continuar. Então, inesperadamente, Akanabe o convida para sair...
A história retrata o dia a dia da Sensei Akanabe, que distribui elogios a Sakieda sem qualquer constrangimento, e de Sakieda, que tenta aceitar tudo com naturalidade.

altTitles.en: The Maid Who Can't Hide Her Feelings (Serialization)

altTitles.ja: メイカさんは押しころせない

altTitles.pt-br: A Empregada Que Não Consegue Esconder Seus Sentimentos (Serialização)

altTitles.vi: Meika-san Không Thể Thổ Lộ Tình Cảm Của Cô Ấy

description.en: A serialization of the webcomic about a maid, Meika, who can't completely suppress her feelings for her master, Kouta.
description.vi: Một câu chuyện kể về một cô hầu gái, Meika, người không thể kìm nén hoàn toàn tình cảm của mình dành cho chủ nhân của cô ấy, Kouta.
description.es-la: Una serialización del webcomic sobre una maid, Meika, quien no puede reprimir por completo sus sentimientos por su amo, Kouta.
description.pt-br: A serialização da webcomic sobre uma empregada, Meika, que não consegue ocultar completamente seus sentimentos pelo seu mestre, Kouta.

description.en:
The story of the "Three Jinnai from Edo" (Kosaka, Tobisawa, Shoji)  
Eight year of the Keicho era, 3 years after the Battle of Sekigahara (1603 AD) Okubo Nagayasu calls on Kosaka Jinnai, who is known as the best thief in Japan, to eliminate the bandit gang led by Fuma Kotaro.  
A fierce battle between the Jinnais and the Fuma clan opens its curtain !!
description.ja: 高坂甚内・鳶沢甚内・庄司甚内の物語。関ヶ原の戦いから３年が経過した慶長８年（西暦1603年）大久保長安は群盗風魔党を打倒すべく、希代の盗賊として名を馳せる高坂甚内を呼び寄せる。甚内たちと風魔一族の壮絶なる闘いが、今幕を開ける！！

description.en: Hasuno, a screenwriter with zero housekeeping skills, decides to ask Higure, a junior student at his university whom he has always cared about, to do housework for him as a part-time job. As Higure takes care of Hasuno, a senior who he admires, he gradually begins to notice a change in his feelings. ......A pure and slightly carbonated love story between a popular scriptwriter with beauty in all directions and a quiet junior student.

altTitles.en: I Will Not Succumb to Love
I Won't Fall in Love Again

description.en: The story centers on Rei, a woman who dislikes unreasonable things. When she begins working at a human resources consulting company, she meets Ninomiya, a man whom Rei acknowledges has skill, but only makes arguments from logic without concern for someone else's feelings. (ANN)
description.es: Rei, una mujer que odia las cosas irrazonables. Cuando comienza a trabajar en recursos humanos, conoce a Kyoka, su superior, quien es brillante pero nada trabajador.
description.pt-br: Rei é uma mulher que detesta coisas irracionais. Quando ela começa a trabalhar na parte de recursos humanos de uma empresa de consultoria, ela acaba conhecendo Kyoya, seu superior e alguém que é brilhante porém sem valor algum.

title.en: When I sent the wrong reply...

description.en: What happens after sending a reply to the group chat?

*A spin-off of the YuruYuri series featuring the Oomuro family of sisters!*

From oldest to youngest, there's **Nadeshiko**, the cool and serious high schooler; **Sakurako**, the silly, lazy, and (slightly) dimwitted middle schooler; and **Hanako**, the intelligent and mature elementary schooler! 

This story focuses on these three sisters, their friends. and the many fun and wild adventures they have together!
description.ja: 優秀な長女・撫子、残念な次女・櫻子、優秀な三女・花子からなる大室家３姉妹。自由奔放な櫻子を中心に今日も大室さん家は賑やかです♪

title.en: I Need Someone to Stop My Older Brothers

altTitles.ko: 누가 우리 오빠들 좀 말려 주세요

description.en:
I only went to calm the disturbance in front of my house, but the one I encountered was the Demon King that I punished, and unfortunately, I was falsely accused of being the demon king and died in the hand of the subjugation team.

‘I’ll kick your ass, Pamel Asinov! I’ll make you shed tears from both of your eyes!’

Among them, the worst one was the hero, Pamel Asinov, who drove me to death as a Demon King!

But when I pleaded to take revenge, I opened my eyes, 500 years later! Pamel’s been dead for a long time, and the ‘brothers’ who came one day…

“Purple eyes. It’s not a color that anyone can have.”
“But I was like this from the beginning.”
“Yes, you were. Because you are the granddaughter of Archduke Asinov.”
“…the granddaughter of Archduke Asinov?”

Of all people, I’m the daughter of ‘that’ Asinov? It’s nice to live a peaceful life, but I was born an enemy’s blood!

‘All the brothers in this house have a habit of hugging people.’

This shitty family. I have to hate them, but why do I keep getting attached to them?

Ye Ji-an, the only S-class guide in Korea, was often called the “useless guide” due to her unique trait of having a 0% matching rate with all espers. After failing to match with an esper from Russia and on her way back home, she is suddenly swept away by a gate manifestation and wakes up alone in a strange temple-like place. The world she has traveled to through the gate is the continent of Wisrode, filled only with espers, and in this place, Ji-an is the only guide…

altTitles.ja: ストーカー×ストーカー

description.en: Getta and Taiyo, college students who were close friends. One day, Taiyo finds out that he was stalking Getta. However, Getta is a stalker of the sun, and collects the baby teeth of the sun.

altTitles.ja: スイートプールサイド

description.en: Oota Toshihiko, a first year junior high school student who is troubled by his lack of hair, is a little jealous of Gotou Ayako, a hairy girl in his swimming club. One day, he is stopped by Gotou at the pool after school, and Gotou asks him for an outrageous favor! "Hey, Oota, can you shave my hair?"
description.id: Oota Toshihiko adalah seorang cowok yang berbeda dari cowok lainnya. Tak satupun tumbuh bulu di badannya. Akibat sebuah kejadian, menjadikan dia mempunyai pekerjaan mencukur bulu cewek.

description.en: Dungeons are the stuff of dreams—defeat the monsters, take their loot, and then venture into uncharted territory to discover hidden riches! Tina, an upstart adventurer with just such a dream, ends up mortally wounded while exploring a dungeon. Suddenly, the great demon known as the Beast King Garon, who was supposed to have been slain by a hero in the distant past, appears before her!  Dungeon fantasy meets medical drama!
description.ru:
Подземелья - это воплощение мечты…
Собирайте материалы с поверженных монстров,
добирайтесь до неисследованных мест и завладевайте сокровищами!
Тина, авантюристка, мечтает о таком успехе,
Исследуя подземелье, она получает тяжелое ранение.
Перед ней появляется сильнейший демон «Король зверей Гарон», когда-то в прошлом он должен был быть убит героем?..

Фэнтези и медицинская драма по мотивам подземелья от Konda Tatsukazu, автора оригинальной истории «Ginrou Bloodborne/Серебряный волк, рожденный в крови», начинается!

altTitles.ja: フェイト／ステイナイト ヘブンズフィール

description.en:
The story takes place in an ordinary Japanese town, Fuyuki City. Hidden from society, there has been a deadly war going on in this town. Seven sorcerers known as "Masters" summon powerful familiars called "Servants," and they all fight each other until the last one. The last one is said to attain the Holy Grail, which will grant them a wish. Only few know when this War started and what the Holy Grail is, but the war is about to begin again this year.  
  
The main character is Emiya Shirou, who lost his parents in a fire and was adopted by a man who called himself a mage. Admiring his stepfather, he has been training himself to be a mage. However, he had no talent and he could barely use even one type of magecraft. His stepfather has already passed away, and today he's a mage without any skills or knowledge. He is involved in the Holy Grail War when he accidentally summons Saber, who is said to be the strongest Servant of all…  
  
Heaven's Feel is one of the routes in Fate/stay night. The heroine of this route is Matou Sakura.
description.es: 10 años después de la Guerra del Santo Grial, una batalla librada por Maestros y Sirvientes por el recipiente que concede los deseos, el Santo Grial, estalla otra guerra en la ciudad de Fuyuki. Shirou Emiya, el hijo adoptivo de Kiritsugu Emiya, participante de la Guerra del Santo Grial anterior, lleva una vida pacífica con sus seres queridos. Especialmente cerca de él está su estudiante de primer año Sakura Matou, quien trae bondad a su vida solitaria. Pero una vez que comienza la Guerra del Santo Grial, la vida pacífica de Shirou se rompe.
description.ru: Действие разворачивается в обыкновенном японском городке Фуюки. В нем проходит смертельная война, скрытая от общества. Семеро магов, Мастеров, призывают души великих героев прошлого, называемых Слугами, которые сражаются между собой. Последний оставшийся обретет Святой Грааль, способный выполнить желание. Лишь некоторые знают про эту войну и Святой Грааль, но в этом году война начинается вновь.Главный герой - Эмия Широ, потерявший родителей в пожаре и усыновленный человеком, называвшим себя магом. Восхищаясь отчимом, он тренируется чтобы стать чародеем, однако, не обладая талантом, он едва ли может использовать один вид магии. Его отчим умер, и сегодня Широ маг без каких-либо умений и знаний. Он становится участником Войны Святого Грааля, когда случайно призывает Сэйбер - сильнейшую из Слуг…Манга-адаптация "Heaven's Feel" - одного из рутов в эроге "Fate/stay night" от компании Type-Moon. Героиня рута - Мато Сакура.

title.en: Kimi to Warui Koto ga Shitai

altTitles.en: I Wanna Do Bad Things with You

altTitles.ja: 君と悪いことがしたい

description.en: Mamori Wataya is a tall but dark, plain, and shady high school girl. One day she meets Soushi Fuji, who has a small, thin body and an evil-looking smile. A supporting character that no one can find and a villain that no one likes. This encounter turns their gray days blue.
description.ja: 背は高いけど地味で暗い脇役女子・まもり。嫌いだからとプールの水を抜く、学校一の嫌われ者の悪役男子・藤。悪いヤツの、不思議な強さに惹かれていったその先にあったのは、透き通るような青い日々。

altTitles.en: แบตเทอรี่ คู่หูเบสบอล

description.en:
Meet Harada Takumi—not even in junior high and he's the best pitcher in the region, although he's frustrated and ready to give up, because he can't find a catcher who is good enough to keep up with how he pitches in this backwater town his family has just moved to. Then along comes a kid named Nagakura Gou…  
  
(Source: MU)  
  
Links:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18153)

title.en: Dokidoki! Precure & Kamen Rider Decade! - DOKIDOKI x DECADE (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: ドキドキ！プリキュア、仮面ライダーディケイド！ - DOKIDOKI×DECADE (Doujinshi)

description.en: A world where the Precures died. All people are becoming selfish and only one girl still tries to save herself and others, but the arrival of a Kamen Rider will destroy or modify all of that.

Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.
description.fa:
هانتر‌ها، افراد کنجکاوی که به دنبال گنج‌ها، مجرم‌های خطرناک، مکان‌های ناشناخته و اسرارآمیز، جانوران افسانه‌ای و... هستند. البته برای دست یابی به این موقعیت نیاز به مجوزی است که در بین هر صدهزار نفر تنها یک نفر می‌تواند در آزمون آن موفق شود.
این داستان درمورد چهار نوجوانه که در آزمون هانترها با هم روبه‌رو می‌شوند:
گون، پسری که به دنبال پدرش می‌گردد. کیلوا، پسری که می‌خواهد زندگی جدیدی را شروع کند. لئوریو، پسری که قصد دارد پزشک شود و کوراپیکا، پسری که می‌خواهد انتقام قبیله خود‌ را بگیرد.
description.pt: Hunters são uma raça especial, dedicada a rastrear tesouros, animais mágicos, e até mesmo outros homens. Mas tais atividades requerem uma licença, e menos de um em cem mil pode passar no exame de qualificação esgotante. Aqueles que não passam tem acesso a áreas restritas, lojas de incríveis informações, bem como o direito de chamar-se de Hunters.
description.vi: Thợ Săn là những người đi chu du thế giới, đối mặt với hiểm nguy. Từ bắt giữ tội phạm cho đến nhưng cuộc thám hiểm trên các hòn đảo để tìm kho báu. Câu chuyện bắt đầu khi người cha của một cậu bé tên Gon mất tích đã khá lâu, nên cậu bé quyết định trở thành Thợ Săn với hy vọng tìm được cha mình. Khi được 12 tuổi Gon bắt đầu cuộc hành trình của mình để được tham gia vào "Cuộc thi Thợ Săn Kỳ Tài", ai cũng biết tỉ lệ thành công rất thấp, có khi chết lúc nào không hay. Trong cuộc thi cậu đã kết bạn với Kurapica, Leorio và Killua. Với tình bạn, họ đã trải qua biết bao nhiêu là thử thách, hiểm nguy trên cuộc hành trình của một người Thợ Săn... Còn về phần họ trải qua những thử thách gì và như thế nào thì mời các bạn theo dõi...
description.es-la: Sigue la historia de Gon Freecss, un joven que descubre que su padre, a quien creía muerto, es un legendario Cazador, un miembro de una élite que se especializa en localizar tesoros, bestias raras o personas peligrosas. Decidido a encontrar a su padre, Gon emprende un viaje para convertirse en Cazador. En su camino, se enfrenta a desafíos mortales y forma fuertes lazos con amigos como Killua, Leorio y Kurapika. A medida que avanza en su viaje, Gon descubre que el mundo de los Cazadores es mucho más peligroso y complejo de lo que imaginaba.
description.pt-br:
A série conta a história de Gon Freecss, um garoto de 12 anos que pretende se tornar um Hunter, um caçador de tesouros, lugares perdidos e criaturas estranhas.

Contudo, ao contrário da maioria dos Hunters que procuram fama e dinheiro, o herói da história tem uma motivação maior para querer ser um caçador – encontrar seu pai – um dos mais famosos hunters do mundo.

Mas não é qualquer um que pode se tornar um Hunter. Para poder praticar essa reconhecida profissão, é necessário ter uma licença especial – e para tirá-la é preciso passar – e sobreviver – a exames com milhares de inscritos. Uma vez aprovado e com sua licença Hunter em mãos, o caçador passa a ter direito a acessar áreas restritas, informações secretas e consegue acumular facilmente uma grande fortuna de acordo com seus feitos ? incluindo ir atrás de Hunters que usam seus poderes para objetivos escusos.

title.en: Shuu ni Ichido Classmate wo Kau Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 週に一度クラスメイトを買う話～ふたりの時間、言い訳の五千円

altTitles.ja-ro: Shuu ni Ichido Classmate wo Kau Hanashi ~ Futari No Jikan, Iiwake No Gozen'en

altTitles.en: A Story About Buying a Classmate Once a Week ~ 5,000 Yen for an Excuse to Spend Time Together

altTitles.ko: 일주일에 한 번 클래스메이트를 사는 이야기 ~두 사람의 시간, 변명의 오천 엔~

description.en:
Once a week, Miyagi pays 5,000 yen to her classmate Sendai. The 5,000 yen is to buy three hours of Sendai’s time, which gives the right for Miyagi to give her orders. 

Miyagi is at the bottom of the school caste while Sendai is at the top. The two, who never crossed paths at school, spend time together after school under such a contract. Miyagi’s orders are determined by her mood of the day, and Sendai cannot disobey. One day after school… 

Miyagi calls Sendai to her room and gives her an order that she usually does not give.
description.es-la: Una vez a la semana, Miyagi paga 5.000 yenes a su compañera de clase Sendai.Los 5.000 yenes son para comprar tres horas de tiempo de Sendai, lo que da derecho a Miyagi a darle órdenes.Miyagi está en la parte baja de la casta escolar mientras que Sendai está en la alta. Las dos, que nunca se han cruzado en la escuela, pasan tiempo juntas después de clase bajo este contrato.Las órdenes de Miyagi vienen determinadas por su estado de ánimo del día, y Sendai no puede desobedecerlas.Un día después de clase... Miyagi llama a Sendai a su habitación y le da una orden que no suele dar.

description.en: Ume Sasaki, a senior in high school, is helping out at her great-grandmother's ryokan during this summer vacation. She goes to the ryokan in hopes of getting some hints about her future...? This is the brightest and most dazzling "memory (memoir)" of the girls.
description.ja:
高校最後の夏休み、ひいばあちゃんが営む旅館「花瀧屋」の手伝いにやってきた佐々木梅。
到着したその夜、梅は露天風呂で滑って、湯船に落ちてしまう。
引っ張り上げてくれたのは…〝ねえさま〟と呼んでくる不思議な少女・藤野だった。

いつもと変わらない花瀧屋。
だけど、炭を使った見知らぬ暖房器具があったり、そもそも季節が夏から冬になっていたり。
これって、もしかして…〝タイムスリップ〟？

時代を越え、少女たちの一途な思いが交差する青春冒険譚、第1巻。

altTitles.en: They are Still Being Shaken This Morning

description.en: This is your typical story of a boy who's secretly in love with a girl, they both share a 20 minute ride on the commuter train on their way to different schools, will the boy be able to approach the girl and confess his love? And also... What he doesn't know: There's 3 other passengers that secretly support the boy's secret love towards the girl! Read now the hijinks that ensue when the boy tries to approach the girl; from the creator of *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* and *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.
description.ja: 午前6時58分舞原行きの通学電車。名前も知らないあの子と僕…とその乗客!? 高校生の男女2人が醸し出す甘酸っぱい雰囲気に、乗客たちが心情駄々洩れで盛り上がる!!
description.pt-br: Esta é a típica história de um garoto que está secretamente apaixonado por uma garota. Ambos compartilham uma viagem de 20 minutos no trem do subúrbio a caminho de escolas diferentes. O garoto será capaz de se aproximar da garota e confessar seu amor? E, além disso... O que ele não sabe: há três outros passageiros que secretamente apoiam o amor secreto do garoto pela garota! Leia agora as confusões que acontecem quando o garoto tenta se aproximar da garota; do criador de *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* e *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.

description.en: In the year 202X, when self-driving electric and fuel-cell vehicles are ubiquitous, the racing organization MFG exists. Hosting races in Japan exclusively using cars with internal combustion engine. We follow young half-British, half-Japanese racing driver, Kanata Rivington. Who graduated at the top of his class in racing school and was invited into the series thanks to his teacher's connections.

title.en: The Secret of the Partner Next to You

description.en: Yang Kiryong is an ordinary high school boy who has a classmate named Yoo Jae-Kyung, who is somewhat clumsy and clueless. Both have a very good friendship, but without any kind of love attraction. Until one day, by chance, Kiryong discovered the deepest secret of his friend and because of this his heart began to beat, will it be beats of fear or love?
description.ko:
평범한 남자 고등학생 양기룡.
그리고 언제나 헤실헤실하고 가끔 나사빠진 행동을 하는
그의 짝꿍 유재경.
그럭저럭 귀엽다고 생각되는 반 친구였을 뿐인데..
어느 날 우연히 그녀의 위험한 비밀을 알게 된다.
이 심장의 두근거림은 두려움인지, 설렘인지..?
description.es-la: Yang Kiryong es un chico de preparatoria común y corriente, que tiene una compañera de clase llamada Yoo Jae-Kyung, la cual es algo torpe y despistada. Ambos tienen una muy buena amistad, pero sin ningún tipo de atracción amorosa. Hasta que un día, por casualidad, Kiryong descubrió el secreto más profundo de su amiga y debido a esto su corazón empezó a latir, ¿serán latidos de miedo o amor?
description.pt-br: Yang Kiryong é um garoto comum do ensino médio que tem uma colega de classe chamada Yoo Jae-Kyung, que é um pouco desajeitada e sem noção. Ambos têm uma amizade muito boa, mas sem nenhum tipo de atração amorosa. Até que um dia, por acaso, Kiryong descobriu o segredo mais profundo de sua amiga. Por causa disso seu coração começou a bater, será de medo ou de amor?

altTitles.ja: デッドマウント・デスプレイ

altTitles.vi: Cuộc chơi trên núi tử thần

description.en:
A Necromancer called The Corpse God is fighting against the Church, that is trying to subjugate him. Using his last ounce of power against the Calamity Crusher, he gets defeated, but his reincarnation magic activates.  
 Suddenly, he got transported in a world of modern society and in a body of kid Polka Shinoyama. What is gonna happen to him in this world? What will he do?
description.ru: Стандартный фэнтези-мир. Герой, Сокрушитель Бедствий вступает в великую битву с могущественным некромантом, Богом-Мертвецом. И тут во время кульминации всего сражения Бог-Мертвец применяет невиданную ранее технику. Вспышка света и пуф, наш главный герой просыпается в современной Японии. Да и он теперь не он, а какой-то непонятный мальчишка, которому совсем недавно перерезали глотку. Тут уже впору гарем собирать, да спасать мир с помощью своих сил, да вот только он…
description.vi:
Một Chiêu hồn sư được biết đến với cái tên Chúa tể Thây ma đang chiến đâu với Giáo hội, dẫn đầu bởi Anh hùng trong công cuộc tiêu diệt hắn. Với một chút ma thuật ít ỏi còn lại, Chúa tể Thây ma đã không thể bảo toàn mạng sống, nhưng may mắn là phép chuyển sinh của hắn đã được kích hoạt kịp lúc.

Mở mắt ra, Chúa tể Thây ma giờ đã ở một thế giới hiện đại và cơ thể mà hắn đang chiếm hữu là của một cậu bé tên Shinoyama Polka. Những gì sẽ xảy đến với hắn trong thế giới này? Và hắn sẽ làm gì?
description.pt-br: Um necromante chamado ‘Rei dos Cadáveres’ está lutando contra a igreja, tentando subjugá-la. Mas, ao usar último resquício de poder contra o ‘Destruidor de Calamidades’, ele é derrotado, mas sua magia de reencarnação é ativada. Repentinamente ele foi transportado para o mundo da sociedade moderna, tomando o corpo de uma criança chamada Polka Shinoyama. O que será que vai acontecer com ele nesse mundo?

description.en:
20 nights, 20 terrifying stories. Masaya Hokazono tells us the horrific stories he has experienced as well as those that have been told to him. Even in a technologically advanced modern Japan, traditional spirits never cease to torment the living.

Included oneshots:
Volume 1: Hanashicha Ikenai (Don't Tell), Kengai Imouto Kaidan (Out of Bounds: Sister Ghost Story) [Story: Kihara Hirokatsu]
description.ja:
赤い妹・ネットの妖怪・宇宙人・電車を徘徊する女・深夜のコンビニに集まる亡者たちがあなたを今夜も“インソムニア(不眠症)”にする！

外薗昌也待望のホラー短編集!

altTitles.en: I show my true colors shining through.
There Are Clothes I Want to Wear

description.en:
University student Mami is seen by everyone as the fashionable cool model-type but she secretly just wants to wear Lolita fashion.  
  
While she tries occasionally to be more cute & less "stylish", she can't overcome the image others have of her. When she watches a new coworker at the cafe she works part-time at leave in a extremely flashy outfit, it sparks the courage in her to express herself more truthfully too!

title.en: Blue Archive - Story of Tsukasa Kadoya Sensei in Schale (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: シャーレの門矢士先生概念

title.en: Class no Gal ni Kuuki Atsukai Sareteimasu

altTitles.ja: クラスのギャルに空気扱いされています

altTitles.ja-ro: Kurasu no Gyaru ni Kuuki Atsukai Sareteimasu

altTitles.en: The Gals in My Class Treat Me Like Air

altTitles.id: Aku Dianggap Seolah-olah Udara Oleh Gadis Gyaru Di Kelas

altTitles.es-la: Las chicas de mi clase me tratan como el aire

altTitles.vi: Mấy nhỏ Gyaru trong lớp tôi đối xử tôi như không khí

description.en: A boy named Ryuuji Aizawa is getting treated by his gyaru classmates like he wasn't there, like this girl named Nana Aino who sits on his seat. With him still in it.
description.es-la: Un par de gals parecen no notar al chico delante de ellas.

altTitles.en: I Will Live as an Actor

description.en: To escape a life of poverty, Jang Youngkuk aspired to be a famous actor. And he succeeds... at the cost of his mother's life. Upon proceeding to take his own out of despair, Youngkuk miraculously returns to his childhood. With a second chance to make things right, he swears to abandon acting and be the good son he never was. However, when financial troubles begin to haunt Youngkuk and his mother, he discovers that he may have no choice but to return to the set for one last take.

altTitles.ja: 異世界もふもふカフェ

description.en: Taichi Arima is overworked at his day job. One day, going home late due to working overtime, he saves a fluffy white cat from being run over. He gains a special "Tame" ability and is transported to another world. With such a strange ability, what will he do... Why, open a Fluffy Cafe, of course!

altTitles.ja: テンカイチ -日本最強武芸者決定戦-

altTitles.zh: 天下第一 日本最強武士選拔賽

altTitles.zh-hk: 天下第一 日本最强武士选拔赛

altTitles.vi: Tenkaichi - Thiên Hạ Đệ Nhất Võ Sĩ Đại Hội

altTitles.es-la: Tenkaichi - El luchador de artes marciales más fuerte de Japón.

altTitles.es: Tenkaichi - El luchador de artes marciales más fuerte de Japón.

altTitles.en: Tenkaichi: Battle to Decide Japan's Strongest Martial Artist

altTitles.pt-br: Tenkaichi - A Batalha para decidir o Artista Marcial mais forte do Japão

altTitles.en: First Under Heaven -The Battles To Decide Japan's Strongest Martial Artist-

description.en: Battle tournament manga set in the Sengoku Era. The year is 1600. Ten years have passed since Oda Nobunaga unified Japan. When Nobunaga realized that he was dying, he announced that he would hand over the country to the one who produced the strongest warriors. The warlords, whose dreams of unifying the country had been dashed, set up their own strongest warriors and set their sights on becoming the ruler of Japan
description.ja: 時は西暦1600年。“織田信長”が全国統一してから10年が経過していた――。信長は自分の死期を悟ると、最強の武芸者を輩出したものに“この国”を譲ると発表。天下統一の夢破れた武将たちは、それぞれ最強の武芸者を擁立し、この国の王を目指す！
description.vi:
Một câu chuyện với một chuỗi lịch sử hoàn toàn lạ lẫm với lịch sử mà chúng ta đã và đang từng được biết.
Oda Nobugana, sau khi hoàn thành đại nghiệp thống nhất thiên hạ, nay chỉ vì muốn nhìn thấy cảnh chém giết đổ máu, đã lập nên một giải đấu nhằm chọn ra người sẽ thay mình trị vì cả thiên hạ, "TENKAICHI". Để tham gia, những văn võ bá quan lẫn các trung thần đều sẽ chọn ra cho mình một võ sĩ đại diện, người mà họ cho rằng sẽ là thiên hạ đệ nhất võ sĩ tham gia thi đấu cho mình. Một đại hội đẫm máu và tàn khốc chưa từng có trong lịch sử Nhật Bản chính thức bắt đầu.
description.es-la: Torneo de batalla ambientado en la Era Sengoku. Es el año 1600. Han pasado diez años desde que Oda Nobunaga unificó Japón. Cuando Nobunaga se dio cuenta de que se estaba muriendo, anunció que entregaría el país a quien produjera los guerreros más fuertes. Los señores de la guerra, cuyos sueños de unificar el país se habían visto frustrados, crearon sus propios guerreros más fuertes y pusieron sus miras en convertirse en el gobernante de Japón
description.pt-br: “Quem é o artista marcial mais forte do Japão?” É 1600 D.C., dez anos se passaram desde que "Oda Nobunaga" unificou todo o país. Percebendo sua morte, Nobunaga anuncia que entregará 'este país' àquele que tivesse como seguidor o artista marcial mais forte.

altTitles.en: Shangri-La Frontier ~From Trash Game Hunter to God-Tier Gamer!~

altTitles.ru: Рубеж Шангри-Ла: любитель игрошлака бросает вызов топ игре

altTitles.ja: シャングリラ・フロンティア　～クソゲーハンター、神ゲーに挑まんとす～

altTitles.zh-hk: 香格里拉・開拓異境～糞作獵手挑戰神作～

altTitles.ja-ro: Shangri-La Frontier ~Kusoge Hunter, Kamige ni Idoman to su~

altTitles.pt-br: Shangri-La Frontier - o caçador de jogos ruins experimenta um jogo Divino.

description.en:
Second-year high school student Rakuro Hizutome loves nothing more than finding so-called “trash games” and beating the crap out of them. When he decides to change things up by playing a new, “god-tier” VR game known as Shangri-La Frontier (aka. SLF), he does what he does best: min-maxes, skips the prologue, and jumps straight into action! Rakuro may be a seasoned gamer, but a meeting with an old rival will change the fate of every SLF player forever.

Clad in nothing but shorts and a bird mask, Rakuro (player name: Sunraku) launches into the world of SLF. Things are going well at first as he takes down a goblin, a bunny, and even a python. But then Sunraku comes up against a huge, hard-hitting wolf known as Lycagon the Nightslayer. Will Sunraku’s years of “trash game” experience be enough, or is he about to suffer a rude awakening just a few hours into his SLF adventure?
description.pt:
A adaptação cômica do romance superpopular de Syosetu Ni Narou.  
  
Hizutome Rakurou adora jogos de merda. Seu próximo desafio é Shangri-la Frontier, o jogo divino com uma base de jogadores total de 30.000.000. Reunindo companheiros (ralé) em um mundo expansivo e encontrando velhos inimigos pelo caminho, ele mudará o destino de cada jogador.
description.ru: Главный герой истории — лидер таблиц рейтинга в посредственных малоизвестных VR-играх (так называемый «игрошлак») которые, тем не менее, полностью его устраивают. Но однажды он решается бросить вызов сверхпопулярной игре с 30 миллионами активных пользователей под названием «Shangri-La Frontier». Адаптация суперпопулярного романа из "Shousetsuka ni Narou".
description.pt-br:
O estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, Rakuro Hizutome, adora encontrar os chamados “jogos lixo” e dar uma surra neles. Quando ele decide mudar as coisas jogando um novo jogo de realidade virtual de “nível divino” conhecido como Shangri-La Frontier (também conhecido como SLF), ele faz o que faz de melhor: min-maxes, pula o prólogo e pula direto para Ação! Rakuro pode ser um jogador experiente, mas um encontro com um antigo rival mudará para sempre o destino de cada jogador SLF.

Vestido apenas com shorts e uma máscara de pássaro, Rakuro (nome do jogador: Sunraku) se lança no mundo do SLF. As coisas vão bem no início, quando ele derruba um duende, um coelho e até uma píton. Mas então Sunraku se depara com um lobo enorme e contundente conhecido como Lycagon, o Matador da Noite. Os anos de experiência em “jogos lixo” de Sunraku serão suficientes ou ele está prestes a sofrer um rude despertar apenas algumas horas em sua aventura SLF?

description.en:
Nature made Ash Lynx beautiful; nurture made him a cold ruthless killer. A runaway brought up as the adopted heir and sex toy of "Papa" Dino Golzine, Ash, now at the rebellious age of seventeen, forsakes the kingdom held out by the devil who raised him. But the hideous secret that drove Ash's older brother mad in Vietnam has suddenly fallen into Papa's insatiably ambitious hands—and it's exactly the wrong time for Eiji Okamura, a pure-hearted young photographer from Japan, to make Ash Lynx's acquaintance…  

[Official English](https://www.viz.com/banana-fish)
  
---
Link:  
[ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20197) (anime)
description.tr: Tanrı, Ash Lynx’i güzeller güzeli bir çocuk olarak yarattı; dünya onu soğukkanlı acımasız bir katil haline getirdi. Çocuk yaşta evden kaçan Ash, “Baba” Dino Golzine tarafından bulunur ve hem mafyanın varisi olarak hem de Golzine’nin şahsi zevklerini tatmin etmek üzere yetiştirilir. Şimdi 17 yaşında isyankar bir genç olan Ash kendisini yetiştiren şeytanın ona sunduğu krallığa sırtını döner. Ancak Ash’in ağabeyinin Vietnam’da aklını yitirmesine sebep olan korkunç sır, hırsı dur durak bilmeyen Golzine’nin ellerine düşmüştür. İşte tam bu sırada genç bir fotoğrafçı Japonya’dan New York’a gelir. Temiz kalpli Eiji Okumura ve Ash Lynx olabilecek en talihsiz zamanda karşılaşır.
description.pt-br: A natureza fez Ash Lynx um cara bonito; mas o tempo fez dele um assassino cruel e frívolo. Uma criança fugitiva criada como um herdeiro adotado, um guerreiro treinado, e o brinquedo sexual de seu “Papa”, Dino Golzine, o senhor do crime da Costa do Oeste Oriental. Ash está agora na idade rebelde dos dezessete anos – abandonando o reino de poder e riqueza, realizada pelo demônio que o ressuscitou, preferindo um código para viver entre um pequeno, mas fiel, gangue de bandidos de rua. Porém, “Papa” não pode simplesmente deixá-lo ir. Não quando descobre que o segredo que levou o irmão mais velho de Ash a loucura, no Vietnã, poderá cair em suas mãos insaciavelmente ambiciosas. É exatamente o momento errado para Eiji Okamura, um jovem fotógrafo do Japão, de coração puro, chegar em Nova York e travar conhecimento de Ash Lynx… e ao seu lado, ser atraído para dentro de um redemoinho sangrento de orgulho, ganância, luxúria e ira desencadeada pelo enigma de codinome Banana Fish.

altTitles.ja: 私たちはカケちがっている

description.en: The story follows the shy and elegant "Idomu" Takaku, who becomes interested in his beautiful classmate Hazuki Shinohara, who sits beside him in class. She seems to keep everyone else at a distance, but the truth is that she has no idea how to communicate with others. Hazuki is secretly interested in Idomu as well, but the two have no idea how to communicate their feelings to each other.

title.en: Houkago, Family Restaurant de, Class no Ano Ko to

altTitles.vi: Sau giờ học, tại nhà hàng gia đình, cùng cô bạn cùng lớp

altTitles.ja: 放課後、ファミレスで、クラスのあの子と。

altTitles.en: After School, at a Family Restaurant at Night, With That Girl From My Class

altTitles.pt-br: Depois da escola, em um restaurante familiar à noite, com aquela garota da minha turma

description.en:
It's kind of fun, and I'm comfortable with that kind of time.

The family restaurant after school is the only place where I can feel at ease, as I have no place at home due to my parents' remarriage.
At the family restaurant, I meet a classmate, Kazemiya Kohaku, who is a solitary beautiful girl who doesn't fit in with anyone.
She also seems to be having problems with her family.

From that day on, the boring time at the family restaurant became an enjoyable time to complain with Kohaku.
At the family restaurant after school, the two of them begin their search for a reason not to return home again today...
description.pt-br: É divertido e me sinto confortável com esse tipo de tempo. O restaurante familiar depois da escola é o único lugar onde posso me sentir à vontade, pois não tenho lugar em casa devido ao novo casamento dos meus pais. No restaurante da família, conheço uma colega de classe, Kazemiya Kohaku, que é uma linda garota solitária que não se dá bem com ninguém. Ela também parece estar tendo problemas com sua família. Daquele dia em diante, o tempo chato no restaurante da família tornou-se um momento agradável para reclamar com Kohaku. No restaurante da família, depois da escola, os dois começam a procurar um motivo para não voltarem para casa hoje...

altTitles.ja: クールな同級生の◯◯年後...

altTitles.en: The Cool Classmate XX Years Later...

altTitles.vi: Cô bạn cùng lớp lạnh lùng sau ◯◯ năm...

title.en: Gachi Koi Nenchakujuu: Net Haishinsha no Kanojo ni naritakute

altTitles.ja: ガチ恋粘着獣 ～ネット配信者の彼女になりたくて～

altTitles.en: Obsessive Fangirl Horror: I Want to Be That Streamer's Girlfriend

description.en: Kaguya Hinaki is a female college student who is highly regarded by her classmates because of her good looks. She had a secret she couldn't tell anyone, the secret being that she is genuinely in love with Subaru, a member of a certain streamer group.... Hinaki, who really wants to go out with Subaru, receives a DM from a strange account one day, and Hinaki's life changes completely――。

Four high school classmates, not exactly close friends, share moments that are both fun and irreplaceable, yet tinged with a quiet heartache they don’t even realize. 'It feels like time has stopped.' Youth is both vibrant and muted. These are the daily lives of high schoolers—and the strange twists in between. A story that explores the meaning of a small act of courage in an unconventional coming-of-age drama (Anti-Electric Parade) begins!

Fifty-year-old Yuria has a quiet life teaching embroidery classes in her home, where she lives with her writer husband and his mother. Then one day her world is turned upside down when husband has a subarachnoid hemorrhage and upon arriving at the hospital, Yuria is met by a tearful young man who announces that he is her husband's lover.

Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award in General Category in 2021.

A slum where criminals' descendants live... People beyond the border look down and discriminate them as "tribal people." Ludo, an orphan boy, lives in the slum with his foster parent, Legt, and makes a living using his extraordinary physical abilities. However, one day, he was accused for a crime he didn't commit., and is thrown into the "abyss" which even the slum people fear.
___
Living in the slums of a wealthy town, Rudo and his foster father Legto try to coexist with the rest of the town's residents, but Rudo despises the wastefulness of the upper class. Ignoring the warnings from those around him, Rudo regularly rummages through the town's garbage in search of anything useful or valuable to save from the "Abyss"—a massive hole where anything considered trash is dumped, including people. Rudo's biological father was one such person, having been thrown into the Abyss after he was accused of murder.

One day, after running into a mysterious figure on the way home, Rudo returns to find Legto's dying body on the floor. He is immediately found at the scene by the authorities and is charged with murder. No one believes his claims of innocence, and he is thrown into the Abyss. Instead of dying, however, he finds himself in a strange, foul-smelling place surrounded by monsters made out of trash.

When Rudo is attacked by said monsters, he is saved by a man named Engine, who reveals himself to be a "janitor"—someone who uses special weapons called "jinkis" to combat these creatures. In order to get his revenge on the one who killed Legto, Rudo reluctantly becomes a janitor to fight his way back up and out of the Abyss.
___
**Additional Links:**
- Alternative Official English: [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10010/episode/325146) (US Only)
description.fa:
در اطـــــــراف حلبی‌آباد  پرتـگاهی وجـو د دارد که هرکـس مرتکب
خلافی شود به آنجا پـــــرت می‌شــود. رودو یتــیمی است که   در 
آنجا زندگی میکند اما روزی  به‌خاطر یک پاپوش او را به اشــــــــد
مجازات محکوم می‌کنند.
description.id:
Di daerah kumuh dimana keturunan kriminal tinggal... orang-orang yang di luar perbatasan mendiskriminasi dan merendahkan mereka sebagai "orang suku.". rudo, anak yatim, yang tinggal di daerah kumuh dengan orang tua angkatnya, regto, dan bertahan hidup menggunakan kemampuan fisik hebatnya. bagaimanapun, suatu hari, dia dituduh melakukan kejahatan yang dia tidak lakukan, dan dilempar ke dalam "abyss" yang bahkan orang-orang di daerah kumu bahkan ditakuti.'
Tinggal di daerah kumuh dari kota makmur, Rudo dan ayah angkatnya regto mencoba untuk bersahabat dengan orang-orang kota, tapi rudo membenci borosnya orang kelas atas. mengabaikan peringatan dari sekitarnya, Rudo mengais sampah melalui tempat pembuangan kota untuk mencari barang-barang bernilai atau berguna untuk diselamatkan dari "abyss"- lubang besar dimana apapun yang dianggap sampah dibuang ke sana, termasuk manusia. Ayah kandung Rudo termasuk orang itu, yang dilempar ke dalalm Abys setelah dia difitnah melakukan pembunuhan.
Suatu hari, setelah lari dari sesosok misterius saat jalan pulang, Rudo menemukan tubuh sekarat Regto terbaring di lantai. dia dengan segera ditemukan di tkp oleh petugas dan dijatuhi dengan pembunuhan. Tidak seorangpun percaya ketidak bersalahannya, dan dia dilempar ke Abyss. Alih-alih mati, dia menemukan dirinya di tempat aneh, dan berbau busuk yang dikelilingi oleh monster yang terbuat dari sampah.
Ketika rudo diserang oleh monster itu, dia diselamatkan oleh pria yang bernama enjin, yang menyebut dirinya sebagai "janitor"- seseorang yang menggunakan senjata spesial yang disebut "jinki" untuk melawan makhluk itu. Agar dapat balas dendam pada orang yang membunuh Regto, Rudo dengan enggan menjadi seorang janitor untuk dapat kembali ke atas dan keluar dari Abyss.
description.ja: 犯罪者の子孫たちが暮らすスラム街。境界線の向こうの人々からは「族民」とさげすまれ、差別を受けていた。孤児だった少年・ルドは、育ての親であるレグトと共にスラム街に住み、常人離れした身体能力を武器に生計を立てていた。だがある日、身に覚えのない罪を着せられ、スラムの人々でさえ恐れる「奈落」へと落とされてしまう……。
description.es-la:
Barrios marginales habitados por descendientes de delincuentes. La gente de fuera de la frontera los desprecia y discrimina como "gente de la tribu". Ludo, un niño huérfano, vive en el barrio bajo con su padre adoptivo Legto, y se gana la vida utilizando sus extraordinarias habilidades físicas. Sin embargo, un día es acusado de un crimen que no cometió y se ve abocado al "abismo" que hasta los habitantes de los barrios bajos temen.

(Source: Pocket Magazine)
description.pt-br: O grito redundante da alma que vem do fundo do poço em direção ao mundo infestado pelo desprezo e segregação! O subúrbio onde vivem os descendentes dos criminosos. Mesmo assim o Ludo vivia em meio à esse ambiente, de cabeça erguida, mas......!?

description.en: Lin Ling is unfortunate in everything she does… Until the day she met Fang Wan, a kind and perfect upperclassman. She unconsciously grew attracted to her. Somewhere in the vast universe, there is always someone who is closely connected with you, and if fate allows it, you will never be alone.

altTitles.ja: ブリーチ カラー版

description.en:
Ichigo Kurosaki has always been able to see ghosts, but this ability doesn't change his life nearly as much as his close encounter with Rukia Kuchiki, a Soul Reaper and member of the mysterious Soul Society. While fighting a Hollow, an evil spirit that preys on humans who display psychic energy, Rukia attempts to lend Ichigo some of her powers so that he can save his family, but much to her surprise, Ichigo absorbs every last drop of her energy. Now a full-fledged Soul Reaper himself, Ichigo quickly learns that the world he inhabits is one full of dangerous spirits, and along with Rukia, who is slowly regaining her powers, it's Ichigo's job to both protect the innocent from Hollows and to help the spirits themselves find peace.   
  
Monochrome version won the 50th Shogakukan Manga Award in the Shounen category.
description.es:
Ichigo Kurosaki siempre ha sido capaz de ver fantasmas, pero esta habilidad no cambia su vida tanto como su encuentro cercano con Rukia Kuchiki, una Segadora de Almas y miembro de la misteriosa Sociedad de las Almas. Mientras lucha contra un hueco, un espíritu maligno que se aprovecha de los humanos que muestran energía psíquica, Rukia intenta prestarle a Ichigo algunos de sus poderes para que pueda salvar a su familia, pero para su sorpresa, Ichigo absorbe hasta la última gota de su energía. Ahora que ya es un auténtico Segador de Almas, Ichigo aprende rápidamente que el mundo que habita está lleno de peligrosos espíritus y, junto con Rukia, que está recuperando lentamente sus poderes, el trabajo de Ichigo consiste en proteger a los inocentes de los huecos y ayudar a los propios espíritus a encontrar la paz.  
  
Versión monocroma ganó el 50º Premio Shogakukan Manga en la categoría Shounen.
description.pt-br: Versão totalmente colorida do mangá Bleach. A história gira em torno de Kurosaki Ichigo um estudante de 15 anos que tem uma estranha capacidade de ver, tocar e falar com espíritos de pessoas mortas. Logo que o Shinigami (Deus da Morte) Kuchiki Rukia toma conhecimento dos poderes dele ela decide investigá-lo, e acaba em uma luta com um Hollow que foi atraído pelo forte poder espiritual de Ichigo, antes de ser derrotada pela criatura, Rukia passa seus poderes a Ichigo, o qual se torna um Shinigami, e após derrotar o Hollow ingressa em uma jornada para proteger os humanos e os espíritos da ameaça dos Hollows.

altTitles.ja: 僕はお姉ちゃんのおもちゃ

altTitles.en: I Am My Big Sister's Plaything

altTitles.vi: Tôi Là Đồ Chơi Của Chị Gái

description.en:
Presented by the special tag team of Yoshida Morohe and Yuzuki Ryouta, a gal step-older-sister and a bad-at-communication younger brother make-up comedy!!

Aonuma Aira is a 13-year-old with no romantic or friendly relationships, but one day, due to his parent's remarriage, the high-schooler Misa becomes his step-sister! She's a completely unknown entity to him, and gets way too close way too fast.

Moreover, her hobby is… makeovers? So she starts making him over until he's turned into a pretty girl!

What's in store for him after he's become his step-sister's plaything?

The day after he finds himself dumped by his girlfriend, Sorayama Shun recieves a letter… from himself? The letter was from Shun 25 years ago for his future self. The letter reminds him of the time when he dreamed of owning a Countach and being a successful professional racer. With loads of luck and his ambition to make his childhood dream come true, he finds himself as a new owner of an LP400 Countach.

altTitles.ja: この裏アカ、先生でしょ？

description.en:
Rinko, a high school teacher in her late twenties, is not seen as herself because of her sister, a popular actress, both at work and in her private life, and out of frustration, she starts a "behind-the-scenes account" on social media to post pictures of her body.
One day, while she is fulfilling her need for approval and secretly enjoying herself, a male student, who is a bit of a pain in the ass, comes into her life...

This is the start of a love suspense with a rather distorted age difference.

From the author of Gokusen and Koudaike no Hitobito comes the story of Yui Hayakawa:
an ordinary, uninspired high school girl who's only good at one thing - running! 
But because of her genius younger brother Takeru and his latest experiment, a time machine, 
she accidentally gets sent back to the Sengoku Era missing her beloved dinner steak! 
Will young Yui finally find that 'something' where her entire potential was hiding? 
And will she ever be able to eat that delicious steak her mother made for her?

title.en: Trapped in a Cursed Game as an NPC

altTitles.ko: 망겜 속에 갇혔다 근데 이제 NPC를 곁들인

altTitles.en: Trapped in a Cursed Game, but Now With NPCs

description.en:
I'm going to live a normal life!

...said Shari Azriel, the apothecary of the Dover village.

Then one day, I realised that I possessed an NPC in a video game! I've been locked up here for two years, and I only just noticed.

If I can't get out of the game...
"A, in their 20's, was found starved to death while playing VR games."
This could be what I'm remembered as!

"I have to get out!"

However, it was too late when I came to the realisation that... I can't log out because of an error!

That means, the only way out would be approaching the male lead, "the Lord of Nightmares," and helping his comrades defeat the final villain. So I have no choice but to wait until the game ends...

The difficulty level, the story, the likelihood of failure in such a heinous game, a game that nobody won before...

"The Lord of Nightmares has a strong urge to kill you."

Somehow, I believe that dying by the male lead's hands would be faster.

altTitles.ja: アカアカトシタチノモノガタリ

altTitles.ja-ro: あかあかとしたちのものがたり

description.en:
Itsuki and Hayato, two brothers who grew up in a village nestled deep in the mountains, set out to hunt down a wolf that has been attacking the livestock of the village.  
  
Itsuki is about to go in for the kill when a gigantic beast appears out of nowhere, snatching up the wolf in its jaws and sucking the life out of it.  
  
The beast that stared Itsuki down was a gargantuan, blood-sucking vampire deer…  
  
Will the two brothers be able to return to the village alive ?!  
  
Find out in this blood-filled action-packed story by extraordinary mangaka Kaishaku !
description.pt-br: Itsuki e Hayato, dois amigos que cresceram em uma aldeia situada nas montanhas partiram para caçar um lobo que tem atacado o gado da aldeia. Itsuki está prestes a mata-lo quando um animal gigantesco aparece do nada, pegando o lobo em suas mandíbulas e sugando a vida dele. A besta que olhou para Itsuki foi um gigantesco cervo vampiro... Será que os dois amigos serão capaz de voltar para a aldeia vivos?! Descubra nesta história cheia de ação e de sangue pelo mangaká extraordinário Kaishaku!

altTitles.es-la: Me convertí en la traductora de un tirano

description.en:
Mikael, a tyrant more alone than anybody else, and Leticia, the only one who truly understands him.

She stays by his side for a decade, serving as his interpreter as she is the only person who can understand him.
She announced her resignation so that she may enjoy her second life…

"I'm begging. Please stay by my side"

The tyrant, in fact, had been deceiving everyone by speaking solely in riddles.

“Why did you do this?”

Mikael slowly spoke to Leticia who was overwhelmed with shock and betrayal.

“Because it’s the only way to keep you by my side”
